sentences.english: He gave Powell secretary of state and then began to box him up.
sentences.chinese: 他給了鮑威爾國務卿的位子，然後開始捆住他的手腳。

sentences.english: Mr. Powell met the new Ukrainian leader at his modest party headquarters in Kiev as hundreds of thousands of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 鮑威爾和尤先科在基輔尤先科不起眼的黨部見面。

sentences.english: On March third, eighteen sixty-six, Powell said good-bye.
sentences.chinese: 在1866年的三月三號鮑威爾和我說了再見。

sentences.english: Many areas of Lake Powell's shore can only be reached by boat or on foot.
sentences.chinese: 鮑威爾湖一些岸邊只能靠駕船或徒步才能到達。

sentences.english: Don't you listen to Powell on Voice of America radio?" the cabdriver".
sentences.chinese: 難道你沒聽鮑威爾在美國之音上的講話麼？

sentences.english: But there's a store right down here on Powel Street, so.
sentences.chinese: 在鮑威爾街上正好有一家。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Powell Street and the Nob Hill District on the west.
sentences.chinese: 它的西面是鮑威爾街和諾布希爾區。

sentences.english: None of the water from Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
sentences.chinese: 鮑威爾湖的水一滴都沒有用於灌溉該地區。

sentences.english: Still, Powell's confidence never flagged , and this week it was brimming.
sentences.chinese: 不過，鮑威爾的信心從來沒有標幟，這周是充滿。

sentences.english: The rest of the Joint Chiefs were with the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 其他參謀長都同意鮑威爾主席的意見。

sentences.english: Thorgerson and Powell summarily became the best-known cover artists of all time.
sentences.chinese: 桑格森和鮑威爾立即成爲了史上最知名的封面藝術家。

sentences.english: Only retired Gen. Colin Powell seemed willing to stand up to the fear mongering.
sentences.chinese: 只有已退休的鮑威爾將軍站出來抵抗這種恐懼的蔓延。

sentences.english: Powell and the chiefs felt betrayed.
sentences.chinese: 鮑威爾與衆首領覺得被出賣。

sentences.english: The relationship between Powell and Aspin is still more respectful than relaxed. The dust-up later cast a shadow over the president's ability to work easily with Powell over Bosnia.
sentences.chinese: 鮑威爾和之間的關係仍然比較尊重Aspin比輕鬆。

sentences.english: "When it was time for Powell to go, Harlem decided, " Sharpton said.
sentences.chinese: “當鮑威爾是時候去，哈林決定，”夏普頓說。

sentences.english: Yushchenko's inauguration in his last overseas mission as secretary.
sentences.chinese: 這是鮑威爾最後一次以美國國務卿的身份外訪活動。

dove faction (opposite: 鹰派, hawks)/peace party/the faction seeking peace
to succeed sb in a job/successor
